message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to counterpropose a price of $130.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $135.
I'm glad we're still in talks, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product, but I need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to meet you at $137.50, but that's as low as I can go.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value I believe the product provides, I would like to propose a price of $136.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product, but I still need to make a fair profit. I'm willing to meet you at $138, but that's my final offer.
Thank you for your persistence, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $137.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $138, but I'm not budging from that price. It's the best deal I can offer.
Thank you for your offers, Alice. After considering all the options, I would like to propose a final price of $137.5.
